mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(RECORD_ID) FROM violation_record WHERE VIOLATION_WRIT_NO = #{violationWritNo}

SELECT sum( a.violation_fine ) FROM violation_record a INNER JOIN tenant_vehicle_rel v ON a.vehicle_code = v.vehicle_code AND v.vehicle_class != 3 WHERE a.record_state = 2 AND v.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND a.vehicle_code = #{vehicleCode} AND date_format( a.violation_time, '%Y-%m' ) = #{month}
